short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your new tab screen with 4k team and player images from the New England Patriots.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We think this is the best unofficial New England Patriots new tab replacement and we hope that you'll agree. With great team and player images directly from Patriots.com as well as most recent team news and quotes from players and coaches, our Patriots new tab will show your fandom every time you need a new browser tab!
